insert into comments (id, name, age, nick, comments, reference_id, pic) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nick,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{referenceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pic,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update comments set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, nick = #{nick,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comments = #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reference_id = #{referenceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pic = #{pic,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, age, nick, comments, reference_id, pic from comments
